venue.name: Boston University College of Arts and Sciences Room B36

item.description: Physical, Emotional and Spiritual Affects of Food Choices by Janet McKee and Screening of "Bethany’s Story: The Power From Within." When Janet McKee met a girl who had been suffering from a mystery ailment that baffled doctors get out of her wheelchair after drastically changing her diet, she knew that the story had to be documented for others to learn from. The resulting documentary chronicles Bethany's moving journey from illness to recovery. While the story is unique unto itself, it’s not the first time McKee has seen people recover in ways that can only be termed “miraculous,” and she’s convinced that diet was the one variable that measurably resulted in those recoveries. http://www.sanaview.com/bethanys-story.aspx *FREE* Film & Talk!
item.name: Janet McKee & Bethany's Story *FREE* Film & Talk
